species.name: porygon-z
descriptions: A curious item induced this evolution. The Pokémon's offensive capabilities have greatly increased, but the strangeness of its behavior has magnified in equal measure. This worries me.
Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
A faulty update was added to its programming. Its behavior is noticeably strange, so the experiment may have been a failure.
In order to create a more advanced Pokémon, an additional program was installed, but apparently it contained a defect that makes it move oddly.
Its behavior is noticeably unstable, which is apparently due to the incompetence of the engineer who updated its programming.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

abilities.name: download
abilities.effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
